game.name: Scission
game.genres: Action, Indie, Free To Play, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input
game.shortDescription: Scission is a dark and gruesome action game where you control two characters at once. Fight grotesque representations of the subconscious, master new skills and explore the depth of the human mind in this singleplayer game.
